message:
Dear {{ doc.employee_name }},

Your compensatory leave request has been {{ doc.workflow_state }} Manager. Please find the details below:

Leave Details:
- Leave Type: {{ doc.leave_type }}
- Compensatory Work Period: {{ doc.work_from_date }} to {{ doc.work_end_date }}
- Status: {{ doc.workflow_state }}
Request Link: View Your Request

If you have any questions or require further clarification, please contact the HR department.

Thank you,
HR Team
name: Compensatory Leave Status Update to Employee
subject: Your Compensatory Leave Request Has Been {{ doc.workflow_state }}
